description: Jessy, a marine energy technician, has 10 units of energy credits. Jessy can allocate some/all credits to Bob, an oceanographer who can utilize ocean currents to triple the energy credits. After the enhancement, Bob decides how many credits he returns to Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: allocate all energy credits to oceanographer

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of enhanced credits to energy technician
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of enhanced credits to energy technician
